original_text: The Philistines took hold of Samson. They cut out his eyes. They tied him up with bronze chains. They made him do hard work as their prisoner. He had to push a heavy stone to make grain into flour.
korean_text: 블레셋 사람들이 그를 붙잡아 그의 눈을 빼고 끌고 가사에 내려가 놋 줄로 매고 그에게 옥에서 맷돌을 돌리게 하였더라

sentences.original_text: The Philistines took hold of Samson
They tied him up with bronze chains
They made him do hard work as their prisoner
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그를 포로로 삼아 고된 일을 시켰다

sentences.original_text: He had to push a heavy stone
